description: Develop a MacOS native application for clipboard management.
Architecture must support future extension to iOS.
Increase user productivity by reducing context switching during copy-paste operations.
Handle complex content types including Files and Rich Links.
Cloud synchronization of clipboard history.
User: General MacOS users requiring advanced clipboard features.
Admin: Capability to generate and distribute free license keys.
Compliance with Apple App Store Review Guidelines (Sandboxing).
Compliance with Swift UI/AppKit design conventions.
Obtain and manage macOS Accessibility and Screen Recording permissions.
Global hotkeys must support QWERTY; AZERTY; and QWERTZ layouts.
Target active RAM consumption between 100MB and 300MB.
Implementation of Feature Flags for gradual rollout/testing.
DevOps: CI/CD pipeline integration (Build/Test/Deploy).
Universal Binary support (Apple Silicon/Intel).
Readiness for App Store Review submission.
Target Date: 2026-06-01.
Documentation-as-code strategy for technical specs.
Main Application (UI/Logic).
Background Daemon (Clipboard Listener).
Adherence to defined Class Architecture and Object Model.
Clipboard History Interface.
Trigger: SHIFT+CMD+V (Default) opens fixed window.
Navigation: Arrow keys to traverse; ENTER to paste.
Metadata: Display Date; App Source; Type; Size.
Content Type Handling: Text; Image; Code; Color; Video; GIF; Files.
Search and Filter: Real-time filtering by tags and content type.
Pinned Items (Floating Windows).
Pinned item must be resizable and draggable.
Lock mode: Prevent editing of pinned content.
Transparency: Window becomes transparent on hover.
Sequential Copying (Temporary Stack).
Trigger: SHIFT+CMD+C opens temporary clipboard.
Paste Mode: Support FIFO and LIFO sorting.
OCR / Screen Text Capture.
Trigger: SHIFT+CMD+2 activates area selection for text extraction.
Color Picker Utility.
Trigger: SHIFT+CMD+1 activates color picker.
Color Metadata: Visual preview + Hex/RGB text.
Export: Convert color to user-selected format.
User Story: Developer copying code snippets to batch paste.
User Story: Designer pinning color palette reference.
Critical Path: Core History; Paste; UI Rendering.
Latency Targets: Capture <10ms; Search <100ms; UI <150ms.
Unit Tests covering >80% of business logic.
UI Tests for pinning and window transparency behavior.
Security: AES-256 encryption for data at rest.
